snippet.title: GT Manager - Gameplay Trailer & Early Access announcement
snippet.description:
GT Manager races past the chequered flag and releases into Early Access on Steam, Epic and GOG this September! 

Strap yourself in; the chance to lead a championship-winning team in the world of GT racing arrives in September with the first endurance racing management game: GT Manager! Developed by The Tiny Digital Factory, an Indie studio specialising in racing and management games,  GT Manager puts you in the hot seat as a team manager at the race track and at the factory. Featuring 5 racing categories from GT4 to Hypercars, 25 iconic racing cars from 16 world-renowned manufacturers, 40 official drivers, and 35 official Endurance teams, GT Manager is gearing up to take you on a whistle-stop tour of the world of motorsports! 

GT Manager is available to wishlist on Steam before its planned Early Access release in September. GT Manager will be released at a discounted €19.99 (rising to €24.99 at full launch), available as a Deluxe Edition that includes the Aston Martin Valkyrie AMR Pro and Bugatti Bolide.

__________
 
Wishlist NOW on Steam: https://bit.ly/3O4iMoK
Visit the Official Website: https://gtmanagerpc.com/
Join the community: https://linktr.ee/gtmanagerpc
__________

Developer Website: https://tinydigitalfactory.com/
